nodes.text: The Last Jedi (French: Les derniers Jedi) is a junior novel adaptation of Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. The Last Jedi was written by Catherine Kalengula and published by Hachette Jeunesse on March 28, 2018.

The First Order rules the galaxy. Only a handful of Resistance fighters continue to fight. They are led by Leia Organa. All have but one hope: that the great Jedi Master Luke Skywalker will agree to come back and help them…
